item.title: Manager Conference Links
item.description: A couple of EM conferences folks might find useful: SFELC Summit An annual celebration for engineering leaders. A wide range of topics. One day, multiple tracks. Great speaker lineup. A refresher on management fundamentals. Workshops and Breakouts. Calibrate Youâ€™re a great engineer. Become a great leader. Calibrate is aimed at practicing engineering managers, responsible for the people on their team. You can find videos of previous years here. TEMSCON Research-focused engineering management conference.
